languages.text: {n}Октавиана понижает голос.{/n} "Владайм станцию упустил. Многие этим недовольны, в том числе и его деловые партнеры. Если вдруг с Токара что-то случится, приходите сюда — {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}ваш с Касбалликой бизнес не должен пострадать{/d} из-за амбиций бывшего Наместника".

{n}Octaviana lowers her voice.{/n} "Vladaym has let the station slip away from him. Plenty of people aren't happy about it, not least his business partners. Should something happen to Tocara, come here. {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}Your dealings with the Kasballica{/d} shouldn't take a hit because of the old Liege's ambitions."
languages.original_text: {n}Октавиана понижает голос.{/n} "Владайм станцию упустил. Многие этим недовольны, в том числе и его деловые партнеры. Если вдруг с Токара что-то случится, приходите сюда — {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}ваш с Касбалликой бизнес не должен пострадать{/d} из-за амбиций бывшего Наместника".

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana lowers her voice.{/n} "Vladaym has let the station slip away from him. Many are displeased with that, including his business partners. Should something happen to Tocara, come here. Yours and the Kasballica's business shouldn't take a hit because of an ex-Liege's ambitions."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana lowers her voice.{/n} "Vladaym has let the station slip away from him. Many are displeased with that, including his business partners. Should something happen to Tocara, come here. {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}Your dealings with the Kasballica{/d} shouldn't take a hit because of the old Liege's ambitions."

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜压低了声音。{/n}“弗拉迪姆没能控制住这座星站，很多人都对此大为不满，他那些商业伙伴更是如此。所以，如果托卡拉出了什么意外的话，就来这里吧。{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}你和卡斯巴利卡之间的生意{/d}，不该因为某个前任总督的问题受到影响。”
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana lowers her voice.{/n} "Vladaym has let the station slip away from him. Plenty of people aren't happy about it, not least his business partners. Should something happen to Tocara, come here. {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}Your dealings with the Kasballica{/d} shouldn't take a hit because of the old Liege's ambitions."

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜压低了声音。{/n}“奥克塔维娜没能控制住这座星站，很多人都对此大为不满，包括他那些的商业伙伴。所以，如果托卡拉出了什么意外的话，就来这里吧。你和卡斯巴利卡之间的生意，不该因为某个前任总督的问题受到影响。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナはヒソヒソと話す。{/n}「ヴラダイムはステーションを手放しました。それに不満を抱く者は多く、仕事相手もその一部です。もしトカラに何かあれば、ここに来てください。前領主の野心のせいで、{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}あなたとカスバリカの件{/d}に障害があるなんていけませんからね」
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana lowers her voice.{/n} "Vladaym has let the station slip away from him. Plenty of people aren't happy about it, not least his business partners. Should something happen to Tocara, come here. {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}Your dealings with the Kasballica{/d} shouldn't take a hit because of the old Liege's ambitions."

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナはヒソヒソと話す。{/n}「ヴラダイムはステーションを手放しました。それに不満を抱く者は多く、仕事相手もその一部です。もしトカラに何かあれば、ここに来てください。前領主の野心のせいで、{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}あなたとカスバリカの件{/d}に障害があるなんていけませんからね」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana baja la voz.{/n} «Vladaym ha dejado que la estación se le escape. Muchos no están contentos con eso, incluidos sus socios comerciales. Si le pasa algo a Tocara, venga. {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}Sus negocios con la Kasballica{/d} no deberían verse afectados por las ambiciones del Señor anterior».
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana lowers her voice.{/n} "Vladaym has let the station slip away from him. Plenty of people aren't happy about it, not least his business partners. Should something happen to Tocara, come here. {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}Your dealings with the Kasballica{/d} shouldn't take a hit because of the old Liege's ambitions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana baja la voz.{/n} «Vladaym ha dejado que la estación se le escape. Muchos están descontentos con eso, incluidos sus socios comerciales. Si le pasa algo a Tocara, venga. Su negocio y el de la Kasballica no debería verse afectado por las ambiciones del Señor anterior».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana senkt ihre Stimme.{/n} "Vladaym ist die Station entglitten. Viele Leute sind darüber nicht erfreut, am wenigsten seine Geschäftspartner. Sollte Tocara etwas zustoßen, kommt hierher. {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}Eure Geschäfte mit der Kasballica{/d} sollten nicht unter den Ambitionen des alten Lehnsherrn leiden."
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana lowers her voice.{/n} "Vladaym has let the station slip away from him. Plenty of people aren't happy about it, not least his business partners. Should something happen to Tocara, come here. {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}Your dealings with the Kasballica{/d} shouldn't take a hit because of the old Liege's ambitions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana senkt ihre Stimme.{/n} "Vladaym ist die Station entglitten. Viele sind darüber verärgert, auch seine Geschäftspartner. Sollte Tocara etwas geschehen, kommt her. Eure Geschäfte und die Kasballica sollten nicht unter den Ambitionen eines Ex-Lehnsherren leiden."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana baisse la voix.{/n} « Vladaym a laissé la station lui échapper, au grand dam de bon nombre de gens, à commencer par ses associés. Si quelque chose devait lui arriver, venez me voir. Il serait regrettable que {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}vos tractations avec la Kasballica{/d} pâtissent des ambitions de l'ancien suzerain. »
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana lowers her voice.{/n} "Vladaym has let the station slip away from him. Plenty of people aren't happy about it, not least his business partners. Should something happen to Tocara, come here. {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}Your dealings with the Kasballica{/d} shouldn't take a hit because of the old Liege's ambitions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana baisse la voix.{/n} « Vladaym a laissé la station lui échapper et ça énerve beaucoup de monde, notamment ses associés. Si quelque chose devait lui arriver, venez me voir. Il ne faut pas que vos affaires et celles de la Kasballica pâtissent des ambitions d'un suzerain déchu. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Vladaym, istasyonu kaderine terk etti. Bundan hazzetmeyen çok kişi var, iş ortaklarını saymıyorum bile. Tocara'nın başına bir iş gelirse buraya uğrayın. Sabık Emîr'in hayalleri yüzünden {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}Kasballica'yla ilişkileriniz{/d} bozulmayacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana lowers her voice.{/n} "Vladaym has let the station slip away from him. Plenty of people aren't happy about it, not least his business partners. Should something happen to Tocara, come here. {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}Your dealings with the Kasballica{/d} shouldn't take a hit because of the old Liege's ambitions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana sesini kısıyor.{/n} "Vladaym, istasyonu kaderine terk etti. Bundan hazzetmeyen çok kişi var, iş ortaklarını saymıyorum bile. Tocara'nın başına bir iş gelirse buraya uğrayın. Sabık Emîr'in hayalleri yüzünden {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}Kasballica'yla ilişkileriniz{/d} bozulmayacaktır."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
